name: Unreal Maze Survival
description: Survive for a given time in 10 different pre built mazes each with its own unique theme, size, and difficulty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Should work on any Graphic Processor due to graphic settings unless your Graphic Processor is very outdated. Storage: 3500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: i7 Storage: 3500 MB available space
